receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Train, Restaurant, Taxi, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Telecommunications
receiptStandards.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt must show the business name of the supplier/vendor providing the goods or services

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Train, Restaurant, Taxi, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Telecommunications
receiptStandards.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt must show the date when the expense was incurred

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Train, Restaurant, Taxi, Office supplies, Software, Equipment
receiptStandards.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt must display the total cost including all taxes and fees

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Train, Restaurant, Taxi, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Telecommunications
receiptStandards.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt must specify the goods or services purchased with detailed breakdown

receiptStandards.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司
receiptStandards.rule: Invoice title/header must be that of the Local Employer: Company Name 公司名称: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司

receiptStandards.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司
receiptStandards.rule: Must show Company Tax Code 纳税人识别号: 913101153123807359

receiptStandards.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司
receiptStandards.rule: Must show Company Address and Landline 地址电话: 中国(上海)自由贸易试验区临港新片区鸿音路3156弄8号4层121室 021-62365280

receiptStandards.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司
receiptStandards.rule: Must show Bank Name: 开户银行:中国工商银行股份有限公司上海漕河泾开发区支行 and Bank Account Number 银行账号: 100126630920 0329 328

receiptStandards.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
receiptStandards.rule: For flights: itinerary must show employee name. For hotels: detailed bill must show guest name. For trains: ticket must show employee name

receiptStandards.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
receiptStandards.rule: Telephone/Mobile phone fapiaos can be in the name of the employee

receiptStandards.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
receiptStandards.rule: Where possible, workers should collect a VAT special invoice (增值税专用发票) with special seal for invoices

receiptStandards.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
receiptStandards.rule: For taxi hailing apps, only official invoice of tax bureau marked with invoice number can be used as basis for reimbursement

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Train, Restaurant, Taxi, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Telecommunications
receiptStandards.rule: Receipts must show: What (expense type/category), Where (place of expense), When (time of expense)

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Transportation (airline tickets, train, bus, taxi etc.) are tax exempt for both employer and worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Hotel, Office Rent, Meeting Room Rent are tax exempt for both employer and worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Personal Meal during Business Trips generally not exceeding 150 RMB/day/person is tax exempt. Set rates: 1st tier cities (Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen) 200 yuan per day (80 yuan per meal lunch/dinner), new 1st tier and 2nd tier cities 150 yuan per day (60 yuan per meal), 3rd tier cities 100 yuan per day (40 yuan per meal). Meals exceeding limit treated as entertaining customers or reimbursed after withholding personal income tax

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Fuel fees on cars not owned by employer: Usually paid as taxable Car Allowance between RMB 1.5-2.5 per KM. Common rate 1.5 to 2.5 yuan per kilometer

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Parking fees and highway tolls: Either Corporate Income Tax (25%) or Individual Income Tax applied if cannot prove expenses for entertaining customers

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Per Diem (no invoices) subject to Individual Income Tax, except for exemptions which apply to expat workers

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Per diem rates subject to Individual Income tax, except for exemptions which apply to expat workers

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Office Supplies (knifes, folders, toilet tissues, printer) are tax exempt for both employer and worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Office equipment (laptops, etc.), Work-protection tools, Fixed assets/furniture/electrical appliances are tax exempt for both employer and worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Electronic products and accessories, communication equipment (routers, cell phones, except gifts to employees) are tax exempt for both employer and worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Telephone/communication fees on devices registered under company name are tax exempt for both employer and worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Telephone/communication fee invoices with individual name (SIM card NOT registered under company name) are subject to Individual Income Tax for worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Network IT service is tax exempt for both employer and worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Government-issued receipts (visa fees etc.) are tax exempt for both employer and worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.expense_type: Entertainment service fees for team building
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Entertainment service fees for team building activities (dinners, beverages, KTV, tourist attractions, refreshments, food, cigarettes) subject to Corporate Income Tax (25%) for employer, tax exempt for worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Entertainment expenses with clients (meals, beverages, spirits, tobacco, KTV, tourist attractions, refreshments) subject to Corporate Income Tax (25%) for employer, tax exempt for worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Small and medium-sized appliances (microwave ovens, except gifts to employees) subject to Corporate Income Tax (25%) for employer, tax exempt for worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.expense_type: Gifts and shopping cards for customers
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Gifts and shopping cards for customers subject to Corporate Income Tax (25%) for employer, tax exempt for worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.expense_type: Shopping cards and gifts for employees
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Shopping cards and red packets (Hong Bao) for employees as gifts subject to Corporate Income Tax (25%) for employer AND Individual Income Tax for worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Annual Medical Check subject to Corporate Income Tax (25%) for employer AND Individual Income Tax for worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Gym expenses subject to Corporate Income Tax (25%) for employer AND Individual Income Tax for worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Daily cleaning/hygiene products (dishwashing liquid, cosmetics) either Corporate Income Tax (25%) or Individual Income Tax applied

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Sports equipment either Corporate Income Tax (25%) or Individual Income Tax applied

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Toys either Corporate Income Tax (25%) or Individual Income Tax applied

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Small non-commonly used appliances (juicers) depends on specific appliance - verify before buying

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Marketing Activity expenses with single tax fapiao amount bigger than CNY30,000 (about USD4500) without service contract may be challenged by tax bureau

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.expense_type: Entertainment expenses requiring corporate tax pass-through
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: If GoGlobal required to process entertainment expense reimbursement, involved corporate income tax (15%-25%) passed to end client

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Claims without proper Fapiao considered as employee income and subjected to personal income tax with monthly salary. Tax rate based on individual's accumulated annual income from 3% to 45%

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Train, Restaurant, Taxi, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Telecommunications
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Original invoice and deduction sheet must be sent to Local Employer's Dalian Branch: Name: Sylvia Jiang, Office Address: 大连市高新园区高新街9号晟辉科技大厦703室, Tel.: +86 17615158127 or 0411-81760355 dial 808. Use S.F. Express paid by shipper and collect express fee invoice for reimbursement

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Train, Restaurant, Taxi, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Telecommunications
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Business expenses must be submitted within 4 months from date of issuance. Invoices cannot be used across years

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Manager approval required. Submit expense reimbursement form to direct manager with Local Employer cc'd payroll.all@talentbankglobal.com, indicating total amount in email body

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Forward approved emails/documents and completed expense reimbursement template to payroll.all@talentbankglobal.com before 5th of month

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Original invoices must be submitted before 20th of month according to local employer's invoice filing guidelines

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Exchange rate documentation required - use spot exchange purchase price issued by Bank of China on first working day of month after returning from business trip. Foreign currency expenses must be entered line by line according to invoices

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Hotel detailed bill required along with fapiao showing length of stay

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Air ticket itinerary required as auxiliary certificate showing round trip air ticket, ticket itinerary. For travel agency purchases: invoice with worker name, round trip city and time period required

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Printed paper train tickets required as proof of expense. National train ticket reimbursement certificate can be printed at station ticket window and automatic ticket vending machines

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: For Didi or other ride-hailing apps: trip details/itinerary required along with official tax bureau invoice. Exception: "Didi Chuxing" can provide "car-hailing service fee" invoices for express/special cars

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Business justification required proving expenses for entertaining customers. Personal car license plate number on invoice cannot be reimbursed directly

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Documentation of city tier classification required for per diem rates: 1st tier (Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen), new 1st tier and 2nd tier cities listed, 3rd tier (all other cities)

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Detailed purchase list required if fapiao shows "Please Refer To Detailed Purchase List"

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Contract required between Local Employer and provider for company services (IT services, advertising agencies). Worker must contact Local Employer 5 working days in advance

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Service contract required for marketing expenses with single fapiao amount over CNY30,000 to avoid tax bureau challenge

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: 上海炎焰企业管理有限公司, GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Any personal information not required for reimbursement purposes should be removed before submission

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Business purpose required if not shown on receipt - indicate on expense report. Business relationship to taxpayer or persons involved required if not shown on receipt - indicate on expense report

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expense report filled out according to internal policy required

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Scanned copies of receipts/fapiaos submitted to HR by 5th of each month

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Hard copy documents submitted to GoGlobal Finance Team: Room B102, Block B, Jiaozi Financial Technology Center, No. 1677, north section of Tianfu Avenue, Guixi street, Wuhou District, Chengdu, Sichuan Province, Tel: 19921181138

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal China
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Fapiaos pasted on A4-sized paper in chronological order following expense claim form sequence, similar-sized fapiaos grouped on one sheet. Electronic fapiaos must be printed
